titleStmt.title: Three sermons: a remedie for securitie. The ruine of Gods enemies. The worldlings downfall. By Samuel Hieron
titleStmt.author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Cantrell Legge, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge. 1609. And are to be sold by Samuel Macham in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Bulls head [London],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Bulls head [London]
